opennlp.tools.cmdline

Class BasicCmdLineTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • opennlp.tools.cmdline.CmdLineTool
      • opennlp.tools.cmdline.BasicCmdLineTool
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CensusDictionaryCreatorTool, ChunkerMETool, DictionaryBuilderTool, DictionaryDetokenizerTool, DoccatTool, EntityLinkerTool, ParserTool, POSTaggerTool, SentenceDetectorTool, SimpleTokenizerTool, TaggerModelReplacerTool, TokenizerMETool, TokenNameFinderTool

    public abstract class BasicCmdLineTool
extends CmdLineTool
    A simple tool which can be executed from the command line.

    Note: Do not use this class, internal use only!
